data.text: Great location and great price. Stayed there for 3 nights and had the most lovely time. Staffs are really friendly and make you feel at home. Services are great and attentive. Breakfast: Good selection and worth the price. Overall a very nice experience and would definitely come back next time!
data.title: Good service, location and quality, friendly staff and definitely worth it.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you very much for sharing your marvelous review regarding your stay with us. The entire team is extremely happy that your experience with us has been very good! We are really looking forward to have you back soon in order to continue making you happy in your new home Barcelona. Once again, thank you for choosing us, it has been a pleasure! 

Guest Service Line | ME Barcelona
owner_response.author: MEFORYOU BARCELONA

data.text: Great location, across the road from Placa Catalunya where the hop on hop off buss starts. The hotel is very modern and the reception very dark. The lay out of the hotel is most odd. We took one elevator then had a walk past the dining room to another elevator before reaching the floor our room was on. We did have a nice view to the Placa Catalunya. The roof top pool looked lovely but it was far too cold when we were there in March but beautiful views over Barcelona. Many restaurants close by.
data.title: Great location but pricey.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr/Ms Ahora48, 

Thank you for sharing your experience! We're glad you enjoyed the view from your room and the rooftop pool, despite the weather conditions. We appreciate your feedback regarding the layout, and we'll take it into consideration for future improvements. We hope you had a wonderful time exploring Barcelona and it's restaurants. 

Kind regards, 

Patricia Darceuil | Guest Service Line | ME Barcelona
owner_response.author: MEFORYOU BARCELONA

data.text:
An amazing experience in an amazing hotel 
The hotel is just beautiful, great atmosphere, and wonderful and kind staff. I would specially like to mention Jonatan from the Concierge team who was simply  the BEST. He assisted us with finding and recommending restaurants as per what we wanted to experience. He was supper kind and helpful with making all arrangements,  including booking the time and sending us all the needed instructions.  Rest of staff are also very nice and friendly and in general make sure you feel comfortable by giving personal attention to guests
data.title: Great Hotel with great staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr./Ms. Hanit, 

Thank you very much for sharing your marvelous review regarding your stay with us. The entire team is very happy that your experience with us has been great since we work together to make it happen and we enjoy it.  The positive feedback you provided about us is highly appreciated.
 We are really looking forward to have you back soon in order to continue making you happy in your new home Barcelona. Once again thank you for choosing us, it has been a pleasure! 
Best regards,
Patricia Darceuil | Guest Service Line | ME Barcelona
owner_response.author: MEFORYOU BARCELONA

data.text: The management customer service was awful. I was mislead by the front desk staff that resulted in a $2500 no show charge for nights I didn’t stay even though I was on site for a wedding. Be very careful reserving here. Also fyi they don’t even send reminder emails for stays if you have a discounted stay.
data.title: Be careful

data.text:
Beautiful newly built hotel (although rather ugly office block look from the exterior) with very stylish interiors.
Breakfast was good but wasn't blown away.
I ate in the two restaurants which are on the same floor and share a kitchen. Decent but not amazing and slow service.
The staff are exceptionally friendly throughout the hotel.
Room amenities / welcome excellent.
I would certainly recommend but perhaps eat elsewhere for dinner.
data.title: Trendy 5 star hotel with spectacular rooftop pool and resident DJ in the lobby as you check in!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts about your recent stay at our hotel. We really appreciate your kind words towards team, we are happy that it left a positive impression on you.
We also appreciate your honest feedback about the exterior appearance and the dining experience. We are glad to know that you found breakfast good, but we are sorry to hear that the dinner experience did not fully meet your expectations. Your insights regarding the service and the restaurants' performance are valuable to us as we continually strive to improve.
We take all feedback seriously and will certainly look into ways to enhance to improve. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, providing an even better experience.
Thank you once again for choosing our hotel, and we look forward to the possibility of welcoming you again.

Best Regards, 

Patricia Darceuil | Guest Service Line | ME Barcelona
owner_response.author: MEFORYOU BARCELONA
